sentences.sContent: The only practicable course of action is to sell the company.
sentences.sCn: 唯一可行的做法是把公司卖掉。

sentences.sContent: It is their duty to ensure, so far as is reasonably practicable, that the equipment is safe.
sentences.sCn: 在力所能及的情况下确保设备安全是他们的职责。

synos.tran: 可用的；行得通的；可实行的

words.tran: 实用性，实际性；实际，实例
练习，实践；实施，实行；从事

trans.tranCn: 可用的；行得通的；可实行的
trans.tranOther: a practicable way of doing something is possible in a particular situation
